prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon that has sharp features and a powerful stance.
Imagine a Pokemon with a menacing appearance, sporting dark blue scales and red accents.
Design a fierce creature with the ability to soar through the skies, showcasing its wings.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and agility, with a streamlined body and sharp claws.
Generate a unique dragon Pokemon with a mix of ground and flying abilities.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains and is known for its speed.
Give me a powerful dragon Pokemon that has a tough exterior and a loyal nature.
